column4: hi... i added irc.spotchat.org server to kopete.. then when i restarted my pc... i could not connect to spotchat.org... kopete said it is offline... how do i make it online?
contact the server admin and get them to fix whatever's making it offline?
i use pidgin, the irc.spotchat.org is ok
before i restarted my pc... irc.spotchat.org is ok
